errors.title: Something went wrong
errors.paragraph: The operation could not be completed successfully. Try again.

register.title: What's your email?
register.paragraph: We need to send you information related to your refund.
register.rrssLabel: Or sign in with your social networks

login.title: What´s your email?
login.paragraph: Enter the email used to create your account
login.emailAccountError: We couldn´t find this email address

loginPassword.title: Enter your password
loginPassword.auth/account-exists-with-different-crede: This email address is already in use.
loginPassword.auth/email-already-in-use: This email address is already in use.
loginPassword.auth/invalid-email: The email address is not valid.
loginPassword.auth/invalid-credential: Email/password are incorrect or have expired.

registerPassword.title: Choose a password.
registerPassword.paragraph: We need it to send you information related to your refund.

emailConfirmation.title: Verify your email
emailConfirmation.paragraph: Please follow the instructions we have sent to you

scanPassportPermission.title: Scan your passport
scanPassportPermission.paragraph: In order to refund your taxes we require your passport. Please capture the image of the page with your photograph.

scanPassport.title: Looking good?
scanPassport.paragraph: Please check both pages are complete and with legible information
scanPassport.errorSavingText: An error occured whilst saving your passport, please try again later.

selfiePermission.title: Take a selfie
selfiePermission.paragraph: We need a photo of your face to verify your identity

selfie.title: How do you look?
selfie.paragraph: Make sure we can recognise you

invoiceAddress.title: Billing address
invoiceAddress.paragraph: This information will help you when requesting a bill
invoiceAddress.errorSavingTitle: An error occured whilst saving your address
invoiceAddress.errorSavingText: Sorry, an error occured whilst saving your address, please try again later.

startTrip.title: We require information relating to your trip

home.title: MY TRIP TO SPAIN
home.titleIsSchengen: Our service is not available for residents in countries of the European Union. We will notify you as soon as we launch in more countries

homeAlerts.passport: There are two receipts which require your attention

preScanInvoice.title: Ready to request tax free?
preScanInvoice.paragraph: Please make sure the store supports Woonivers Tax Free and get the store receipt ready.

scanInvoice.title: Looking good?
scanInvoice.paragraph: Please ensure that all information displayed on the receipt is legible

walkThroughSwiper.title1: Welcome to Scan & Go Tax Free!
walkThroughSwiper.paragraph1: Resident outside the European Union? Travelling in Spain? With Woonivers you can complete your VAT refund in supported stores the easy way.
walkThroughSwiper.paragraph2: Get your refund in two simple steps: When shopping in supported stores, scan your receipt with this app. The day of your departure, pass VAT refund control. And later, transfer your refunds to your credit card or bank account. No waits, no queues!
walkThroughSwiper.paragraph3: So you can keep track of any important events on your trip.

notificationPermission.title: Turn notifications on
notificationPermission.paragraph: So you can keep track of any important events on your trip.

locationPermission.title: Share your location
locationPermission.paragraph: So we can share local information with you

alert.title: Ready to leave?
alert.text: Already in the port or airport for your departure? Follow the instructions to authorize your refunds

step2.label: Customs
step2.title: Go to customs
step2.text: Prepare to display the codes from the receipts to the DIVA machine in the invoice stamping area.
step2.machine: What does the machine look like?
step2.machineModal: The DIVA validation machine looks like this
step2.code: How do I display the codes?
step2.codeModal: Put the codes in front of the sensor at waist height.

closeTrip.success: Thank you for using Woonivers. We are validating your information with the tax agency

boardingScanPermission.title: Boarding pass
boardingScanPermission.paragraph: We require a photo of your boarding pass before we can reimburse your taxes. We cannot process your refund until we have verified this document.

boardingScan.title: Looking good?
boardingScan.paragraph: Please ensure that the two pages are visible, and that the text is legible.

noSchengen.paragraph: You are not leaving the Schengen area yet, so you should follow the steps below.
noSchengen.paragraphStep1: Print the email that we have sent which contains the details of your refund, and the instructions once you have arrived to your next destination
noSchengen.paragraphStep2: When you arrive to the airport to leave the Schengen zone, go to customs and ask to have the documents stamped to validate them.
noSchengen.paragraphStep3: Send proof of the validation which they provided in customs

billingInfo.title: We require an invoice containing the following information
billingInfo.name: First name

changeRecoverPassword.changeParagraph: We will send instructions to change your password via email
changeRecoverPassword.recoverParagraph: Enter your email to regain access to your Woonivers account
changeRecoverPassword.postSend: We have sent you an email to reset your password. Please check your inbox.

savings.modalOkParagraph: You have successfully withdrawn the funds

modalNoToken.title: Your session has expired
modalNoToken.paragraph: For your security, the current session has expired. Return to login.

invoices.noInvoices: You haven't scanned any receipt yet

imageScannedRecomendation.2: 2. Place it on a flat surface
imageScannedRecomendation.3: 3. Make sure it is well lit (you can always use the flash)
imageScannedRecomendation.4: 4. Place the camera parallel to the receipt
imageScannedRecomendation.title: Please keep in mind these recommendations:

invoiceDetail.ACTION_REQUIRED_SERIAL_NUMBER: Enter the serial number to validate your refund
invoiceDetail.itsArequirement: It is an important requirement of the Tax Agency to process the refund.
invoiceDetail.rememberSaveOriginalInvoice: Remember to keep the original receipt, you may need it later
invoiceDetail.rejectedInvoice: Receipt rejected by the DIVA system due to a problem related to the invoice number provided by the retailer.

rejectionCode.test: THIS IS A REJECTION CODE FOR TESTING

cameraPermission.title: Camera permissions
cameraPermission.paragraph: In order to scan your receipts the application needs access to your camera.
cameraPermission.paragraphFallback: It seems that you have permanently denied the camera permissions for this application, you must activate them in the phone settings.
